title: Ep 153: The American Success Myth, Coworker Overshares & Dream Crushing
description: What can we learn from Cardi B? More than you can imagine in this week's episode. The American Success Myth - is it all bad? I answer some emails - can a girlfriend ruin her man's dream of becoming a stand up comedian? What about a coworker who downloads on you constantly? How to get out of that mess? A girl's controlling father still annoys the Sh*t out of her even though she's cut contact. All this and more in this week's ep of TDB. GET YOUR LIFE!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
